_header: Sluggy and slow in spitting much

Lam523.Transcription:
Sluggy & slowe in spetyng mucheCold and moyst my natur ys
                    sucheDull of wytt & fatt of contynaunce strangefflewmatyke
                    þis complecioun may not changeDelyberally am lowynge and
                    gladdelaghynge & playynge full seld y am sadSyngynge full fayr of
                    collour bold to syghthote & moyst benynge sanguine y hyghtI am sad
                    & soleynge with hewynes in thoghtI cowet ryght muche leue wyll y
                    noghtffraudulent & suttyl full cold & dryyollowe of collour to
                    wryke am yInvyws[?] dyssenabyll my sckyn ys rogheSuttyll &
                    sklendyr hote and dryOf collour pale my name is malencolly
Lam523.Attributed Title:
ffleumaticus, Sanguenius, Colerica,
                        Malencolicus in margin.
Lam523.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.  
             Secular Lyrics of the XIV and XV Centuries.
         2nd ed. Oxford: Clarendon, 1955: 71-2.
Luria,  Maxwell Sidney,  and  Richard L. Hoffman, eds.  
             Middle English Lyrics.
         New York: Norton, 1974: 111.
